name: dnd_updated_user
desc: Do not Disturb settings changed for a team member.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community Do not Disturb settings changed for a team member  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					dnd:read 				 The dnd_updated_user event is sent to all connections for a team when a user's Do Not Disturb settings have changed.
